text: Predator 2 is a 1990 American science fiction horror action movie. It is a standalone sequel to 1987's Predator. It starrs Danny Glover as an LAPD officer and main protagonist, who tries to catch the main antagonist, the extraterrestrial Predator in Los Angeles. ==Cast== * Danny Glover as Detective Lieutenant Michael "Mike" R. Harrigan * Gary Busey as Special Agent Peter Keyes * Bill Paxton as Detective Jerry Lambert == References == == Other websites == * Category:1990 action movies Category:1990 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:American action movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:English-language movies Category:Predator movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies directed by Stephen Hopkins Category:Movies composed by Alan Silvestri Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life Category:1990 horror movies Category:American sequel movies
title: Predator 2
